There were no other sightings in Hershey on or around January 11th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsNot much to say. Just looked out the window and saw this object. Sun was setting and to the North East out of my bedroom window saw this odd object. Oval (Blimp Shaped) with lights on each end flashing on and off. Could make out shape against the darkening skies. Flew in straight line until was out of range of sight from my window.
